tuv.seg: Familiarize your self with content production guideline and start sharing your visions.
Tutustu sisällöntuoton ohjenuoriin ja aloita omien ajatuksiesi jakaminen.
Ideas are solutions to today’s challenges and visions of the future related opportunities and threats. Idea is always the starting point, plan or intention for potential innovation.
Massidean tietokannassa ideat aina liittyvät tulevaisuustietoon tai haasteeseen. Toisin sanoin, ideat ovat vastauksia tai ratkaisuja tämän päivän haasteisiin tai tulevaisuuden visioihin.

Visions of the future or foresight, concern the long-term futures that are usually at least 10 years away. Vision can be a future scenario, trend or anti-trend, which is most likely expected to be realized in the long run. It can also describe alternative future based on seed of change or a weak signal, which might significantly change our life to unexpected path. Visions identify opportunities and threats and help generating new ideas. Ideas founded on vision are more likely resulting radical innovations.

Challenge is personal, business or social related problem, need, situation or observation. It describes the current status of affairs and recognizes the need to resolve the matter. Challanges are important source for generating new ideas, since they are describing the current market needs. By sharing your challange, you invite others to suggest their own solutions to your challenge
Ongelmat ja haasteet estävät meitä tavoittamasta päämääriämme. On kyseessä työelämän tai henkilökohtaisen ongelma, voimme muuttaa onglman haasteeksi ja aloittaa niiden ratkaisemisen.

ul.li: OIBS content is short descriptions of today’s challenges, visions of the future and the related ideas and solutions.
All content is in the form of an A4 sheet, with the min. length of 1500 marks.
Describe the problem or vision accurately.
Include references in your writing
All content is open and public. Therefore, ideas planned to be patented are not recommended to be added into the database.
The current OIBS is a demo version. Thus, when adding new content we recommend to save a copy of the material for the possible re-adding process into the new version.
To add an idea, it has to relate to the content found in the OIBS database. In other words, there has to be a challenge or vision what the idea is for.
OIBS:in aineisto on lyhyitä kuvauksia tämän päivän haasteista, tulevaisuuden näkymistä sekä niihin tarjotuista ideoista.
Kaikki aineisto on A4-arkin muodossa, min. pituus on 1500 merkkiä.
Kuvaile ongelma tai visio mahdollisimman tarkasti.
Sisällytä lähteet kirjoitukseesi.
Kaikki OIBS:n sisältö on avointa ja julkista. Patentoitavaksi suunniteltuja ideoita ei siis kannata tallentaa järjestelmään.
Sivusto on demoversio. Säilytä kopio tallentamastasi materiaalista, jotta mahdollinen uudelleentalletus sivuston uuteen versioon onnistuu vaivattomasti.
Lisätäksesi jonkin uuden idean, sen on liityttävä tietokannasta jo löytyvään aineistoon. Toisin sanoen ideat (ratkaisut) ovat vastauksia tietokannasta löytyviin ongelmiin tai tulevaisuuden visioihin.
In order to add new content into OIBS, register or log in with your account.
Start by browsing the content or by adding a new challenge or a new vision.
Ideas can be added only when they relate to the content found in the database. In other words, there has to be a challenge or a vision, what the solution if for.
All content is open and public. Therefore, ideas planned to be patented are not recommended to be added into the database.
The current OIBS website is a demo version. When adding new content, it’s recommended to save a copy of the material for the possible re-adding process into the new version of the website.
Rekisteröidy tai kirjaudu sisään tunnuksillasi lisätäksesi tietokantaan uutta aineistoa.
Aloita joko selaamalla sivuston aineistoa tai lisäämällä tietokantaan jokin tämän päivän ongelma tai tulevaisuuden visio.
Ideoita voidaan ainoastaan lisätä tietokannasta löytyvään aineistoon. Toisin sanoen ideat (ratkaisut) ovat vastauksia kuvailtuihin ongelmiin tai tulevaisuuden visioihin.
Kaikki OIBS:n sisältö on avointa ja julkista. Patentoitavaksi suunniteltuja ideoita ei siis kannata tallentaa järjestelmään.
Sivusto on demoversio. Pidä itselläsi kopio tallentamastasi materiaalista, jotta mahdollinen uudelleentalletus sivuston uuteen versioon onnistuu vaivattomasti.

tuv.seg: Challenge is personal, business or social related problem, need, situation or observation. It describes the current status of affairs and recognizes the need to resolve the matter. Write to a person who is not familiar with the topic. Keep your focus on challenge and not related solutions or visions. You can publish those one a separate document and link them later on to this challenge.

seg.p:
Research questions
The single question in which you need an answer.

tuv.seg: Ideas are solutions to today’s challenges and visions of the future related opportunities and threats. Idea can suggest small incremental improvement or radical revolutionary change in thinking, products, processes or organization. Write to a person who is not familiar with the topic. Keep your focus on idea and not related challenges or visions. You can publish those on a separate document and link them later on to this idea.

seg.p:
Idea in one sentence
Summarize your idea's key point to a one sentence.

tuv.seg: Vision concern the long-term future which is usually at least 10 years away. It can be future scenario, trend or anti-trend, which is most likely to be realized. It can also describe an alternative unlikely future based on seed of change or weak signal, which might significantly change all our life if realized. Write to a person who is not familiar with the topic. Keep your focus on vision and not related challenges or ideas. You can publish those on a separate document and link them later on to this vision.

seg.p:
The threat and opportunity
Identify the most important threat and opportunity if vision is realized.

tuv.seg: Your session has timed out, please log in again.
Istunto on vanhentunut, kirjaudu uudestaan sisään.
